com.snamp.hosting

Interface AgentConfigurationStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Aggregator, PlatformService

    public interface AgentConfigurationStorage
extends PlatformService
    Represents a storage for AgentConfiguration instance.
    Author:
    Roman Sakno

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  AgentConfigurationStorage.StoredAgentConfiguration
      Represents persisted agent configuration.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String TAG_LAST
      Represents name of the storage tag that holds the last version of agent configuration.

      • supportsTagging

        boolean supportsTagging()
        Determines whether the current storage supports configuration versions (tagging).
        Returns:
        true, if the current storage supports configuration versions (tagging); otherwise, false.
